description: 2010 census data on the number of establishments per zip code grouped by sector and payrolled employees/establishment size. To create a pointmap of this dataset you must filter for "Meaning of 2007 North American Industry Classification System (NAICS)" AND "Number of Employees".

To create a pointmap of this dataset you must filter for "Meaning of 2007 North American Industry Classification System (NAICS)" AND "Number of Employees".

name: BP 2010 00 CZ2 Business Trends Zip Code by Occupation, Sector, and Establishment Size
